PyOPUS design automation GUI
============================

We are going to introduce the use of the GUI via a demo example: design of a 
Miller opamp. All the examples are in folder 
`demo/gui/miller/ <../../../demo/gui/miller/>`_

The example is based on the demo presenting the use of the PyOPUS library for 
designing a Miller opamp which can be found in folder 
`demo/design/miller/ <../../../demo/design/miller/>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   gui.introduction.rst
   gui.simple-project.rst
   gui.task-evaluation.rst
   gui.post.rst
   gui.task-nominal.rst
   gui.parallel.rst
   gui.task-cbd.rst
   gui.pyori.rst
